V = L * (di/dt)

Where:
- L is the inductance of the inductor
- di/dt is the rate of change of the current through the inductor

Therefore, the correct answer is D. The induced voltage in an inductor is the product of its inductance and the rate of change of the current through it.

Question:
Okutambula ku sipiidi esooka eya 1.5 × 10^6 m/s, proton eyingira mu kitundu ekya magineeti eya bulijjo eya 1.5 T. Singa sipiidi ya proton eyasooka ekola endabirwamu ya 30° n'obusannyalazo bwa magineeti, kibala sipiidi ya proton 4 s ng'omaze okuyingira mu magineeti.

GivenAnswer:
Okukola ekibuuzo kino, tukozesa ebifo ebikuuma obuwanvu bwa sipiidi ya proton nga eyingira mu kitundu ekya magineeti.

Sipiidi esooka ya proton = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s
Bumagineeti = 1.5 T
Endabirwamu = 30°
Ebiro = 4 s

Okukola sipiidi ey'oluvannyuma, tukozesa ekiwandiiko kya sipiidi ya sikulaa:

v = v₀ × cos(θ)
v = 1.5 × 10^6 × cos(30°)
v = 1.5 × 10^6 × 0.866
v = 1.3 × 10^6 m/s

Olwo, ekiddirwa ekituufu kiri C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Mu hypothyroidism, ekikulu ekivaamu kwe kukulira kwa TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone) mu musaayi. Ekyo kiba kitandise kubanga ekiwandikibwa thyroid gland etakola bulungi, era ekyo kiba kye kimu ku buvunaanyizibwa eby'okufuna obulwadde bwa hypothyroidism.

Question:

Question:

Question:
Omulunzi w'ebisolo mu kiseera kino ye nnannyini kiwandiiko ky'ettaka eriyitibwa "A. " Kye kisinga obuwanvu ku bintu bibiri ebiriraanyeewo ku lusozi. Omulimi ye nnannyini ppaaka "B," esangibwa wansi ku "A" ku lusozi. Mu 2000, omulunzi w'ebisolo, eyalina ebitundu byombi eby'ettaka, yazimba enkola y'amazzi g'obwannannyini. Enkola eno yalimu payipu ey'omu ttaka eyali etambulira ku ttaka zombi. Kasasiro okuva mu ppaaka "A" yavudde mu nteekateeka n'agenda mu kaabuyonjo ya munisipaali, eyali wansi w'olusozi. Mu 2005, omulunzi w'ebisolo yaguza omulimi ensawo "B". Ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi tekyayogera ku nkola y'amazzi g'omulunzi w'ebisolo. Ku buli ppaaka kuliko amayumba amanene ag'ekika kya ranch agabeeramu bannannyini go. Gye buvuddeko, amazzi ga kasasiro gatandise okufulumya akawoowo akatasanyusa mu ppaaka "B. " N'ekyavaamu, omulimi yatwala omulunzi w'ebisolo mu kkooti ng'asaba ebintu ebyonooneka olw'enkola y'amazzi. Omusango gulina kuba gwa kusala musango.
A.Omulunzi w'ebisolo, kubanga ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi tekyalimu ndagaano yonna ekugira omulunzi okukozesa ettaka.
B.omulunzi w'ebisolo, kubanga ekigendererwa ekituufu eky'omulimi kyandibadde kya kutawaanya, mu kifo ky'okuyingira mu nnyumba.
C.omulimi, kubanga enkola y'amazzi yali kumpi n'omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa ng'ensonga y'amateeka.
D.omulimi, kubanga omulunzi teyalina buyinza kulongoosa ttaka lye mu ngeri eyaleeta akabi ku mulala.
GivenAnswer:
Okusalawo okwekwata ku musango guno kuba:

C. omulimi, kubanga enkola y'amazzi yali kumpi n'omusango gw'omuwawaabirwa ng'ensonga y'amateeka.

Ensonga zino zikuuma:
- Omulunzi w'ebisolo yali nnannyini ettaka "A" era yali n'obuyinza okukozesa ettaka lye nga bwe yayagala, n'okuzimba enkola y'amazzi.
- Ekiwandiiko ky'omulimi "B" tekyalimu ndagaano yonna ekugira omulunzi okukozesa ettaka lye.
- Enkola y'amazzi yali etambulira ku ttaka zombi, era akawoowo akavaamu kali mu ppaaka "B" omulimi gwe.
- Olw'enkola y'amazzi, omulimi yali asobola okukwatibwa ng'omuwawaabirwa, kubanga enkola eno yali etawaanya.

Kyokka, omulimi ye yali asobola okusalawo okweyongera mu musango, kubanga omulunzi teyalina buyinza okukozesa ttaka lya mulala mu ngeri eyaleeta akabi.

Question:
Ku bino wammanga, kiki ekisinga okunnyonnyola Eurocentrism?
A.Eurocentrism y'enkola y'okwekenneenya ng'amawanga ga Bulaaya gageraageranyizibwa ku mawanga agatali ga Bulaaya okusobola okukola okugeraageranya okutali kusosola ku miganyulo gya buli emu.
B.Eurocentrism sitayiro ey'okulowooza ng'okwekenneenya n'okwekenneenya ebibiina ebitali bya Bulaaya bikwatibwako mu ngeri y'obuwangwa n'obusosoze bw'Abazungu.
C.Eurocentrism annyonnyola okunoonyereza oba omulimu gw'abakugu ogulowooza ku byobufuzi oba ebyenfuna bya Bulaaya byokka.
D.Ebintu bino byonna.
GivenAnswer:
Ekyokubiri (B) kye kisinga okunnyonnyola Eurocentrism.

Eurocentrism kwe kulowooza nti amawanga ga Bulaaya ge gageraageranyizibwa ku mawanga agatali ga Bulaaya mu ngeri y'obuwangwa n'obusosoze bw'Abazungu. Kitegeeza nti Eurocentrism kwe kulowooza nti amawanga ga Bulaaya ge gakulu ennyo era ge gageraageranyizibwa ku mawanga agatali ga Bulaaya.

Ebimu ku bintu ebirala ebisobola okunyonyolwa nga Eurocentrism tebiri mu bino ebimu byokka. Okwekenneenya n'okugeraageranya ebibiina ebitali bya Bulaaya ku miganyulo gya Bulaaya, oba okunoonyereza ku byobufuzi oba ebyenfuna bya Bulaaya byokka, tebikkirizibwa nga Eurocentrism.

Kale, ekyokubiri (B) kye kisinga okunnyonnyola Eurocentrism.

Question:
Ekiteeso ky'okugatta ebibuga bibiri nga tekinnateekebwa ku kalulu, omuwaabi wa gavumenti yawa amagezi ng'agamba nti enteekateeka eno, mu ndowooza ye, teyamenya mateeka oba ssemateeka. Oluvannyuma ekiteeso kino kyateekebwa ku kaadi y'okulonda era abalonzi mu bubuga bwombi ne bakiyisa mu bungi. Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda, kyokka ng'okugattibwa tekunnabaawo mu butongole, omuwi w'omusolo babiri okuva mu kibuga ekimu baatandikawo omusango gw'okulagiriza obumu nga balumba obutuufu bw'ekiteeso kino. Omusango guno gwatuuka mu kkooti enkulu era ne gusangibwa nga gwa ssemateeka wansi w'amateeka ga ssaza n'aga Federo. Mu kiseera kino abawawaabirwa bassaawo ekiteeso nga baagala ensawo eno eyokebwe mu kkooti enkulu mu Amerika. kkooti esobola
A.omusango teguwulirwa, kubanga gwasalibwawo ku nsonga za gavumenti ez'obwetwaze.
B.omusango teguwulirwa, wabula guyinza okuddizibwa mu kkooti.
C.wuliriza ensonga za federo ezikwatibwako, naye bagaana okusalawo ku nsonga ya gavumenti.
D.weesigama ku magezi agaweereddwa omuwaabi wa gavumenti n'obutawulira musango ku nsonga zaagwo.
GivenAnswer:
Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ebikwata ku nsonga eno, endowooza yange eri nti essuubi lya bawawaabirwa okukkirizibwa mu kkooti enkulu mu Amerika tewali kigendererwa. Ekiteeso kyokka kyali ssemateeka wansi w'amateeka ga ssaza n'aga Federo, era kkooti enkulu esobola okuwuliriza omusango ogwo.

Olwensonga eyo, endowooza yange eri nti:
B. Omusango teguwulirwa, wabula guyinza okuddizibwa mu kkooti.

Kkooti enkulu erimu obuyinza okuwuliriza omusango ogwo, newankubadde nga omusango gwasalibwawo ku nsonga za gavumenti ez'obwetwaze. Kkooti eno erimu obuyinza okusalawo ku nsonga eno.

Question:
Ekigendererwa ky'okusoma emirundi ebiri oba emirundi ebiri kwe:
A.Okutuuka ku kugeraageranyizibwa ku bantu abajjanjabibwa n'abatajjanjabibwa
B.Okukendeeza ku nkyukakyuka mu sampling
C.Weewale okusosola
D.Weewale okusosola n'okukyusa ebyokulabirako
GivenAnswer:
Esaala zino zikwata ku nkola z'okusoma emirundi ebiri oba emirundi ebiri:

A. Okutuuka ku kugeraageranyizibwa ku bantu abajjanjabibwa n'abatajjanjabibwa
Okugeraageranyizibwa kw'abantu abajjanjabibwa n'abatajjanjabibwa kwe kuzuula ebitera ebigendererwa eby'okusoma emirundi ebiri. Okugeraageranya kuno kuyamba okukola ensengeka ey'okusoma emirundi ebiri ey'enjawulo.

B. Okukendeeza ku nkyukakyuka mu sampling
Okukozesa sampling ey'enjawulo ey'abantu abajjanjabibwa n'abatajjanjabibwa kuyamba okukendeeza ku nkyukakyuka mu byokusoma. Okukendeeza ku nkyukakyuka kuno kuyamba okufuna byokusoma ebikkirizika.

C. Weewale okusosola
Okwewalira okusosola mu kusoma emirundi ebiri kuyamba okufuna byokusoma ebikkirizika. Okusosola kuyinza okuleeta ebikyamu mu byokusoma.

D. Weewale okusosola n'okukyusa ebyokulabirako
Okwewalira okusosola n'okukyusa ebyokulabirako kuyamba okufuna byokusoma ebikkirizika. Okukyusa ebyokulabirako kuyamba okukola ensengeka ey'okusoma emirundi ebiri ey'enjawulo.

Mu kumaliriza, okugeraageranyizibwa kw'abantu abajjanjabibwa n'abatajjanjabibwa, okukendeeza ku nkyukakyuka mu sampling, n'okwewalira okusosola n'okukyusa ebyokulabirako biyamba okufuna byokusoma emirundi ebiri ebikkirizika.

Question:
Omukyala ow'emyaka 54 ajja mu ofiisi olw'obulumi bw'okukuba amasasi ku matama ge ag'oku ddyo n'ekigwo mu wiiki 3 eziyise. Buli mupiira gw'obulumi gumala akasekondi 1 oba wansi. Obulumi buno butera okuleetebwa empewo enzirugavu, okunywegera, okukwata amannyo n'okwoza amannyo. Tafunye buzibu bwonna ku maaso wadde ku mutwe. Ebyafaayo by'obujjanjabi byewuunyisa olw'obulumi bw'omutwe obw'amaanyi, obunene obungi, n'okulongoosebwa kw'omu lubuto. Tewali bunafu bw'amaaso oba okufiirwa okuwulira. Okukeberebwa kw'omubiri okusigaddewo kulaga nti tewali kikyamu kyonna. Okukebera omutwe ku CT n'enjawulo n'obutabeera na njawulo kiraga nti tewali kikyamu. Ku bino wammanga, ddagala ki erisinga obulungi mu kiseera kino?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
Ku bujjanjabi buno, ddagala erisinga obulungi mu kiseera kino ni C. Levetiracetam.

Ensonga zino:
1. Omulwadde ono alina obulumi bw'okukuba amasasi ku matama ge ag'oku ddyo n'ekigwo, era buli mupiira gw'obulumi gumala akasekondi 1 oba wansi. Obulumi buno butera okuleetebwa empewo enzirugavu, okunywegera, okukwata amannyo n'okwoza amannyo.
2. Tafunye buzibu bwonna ku maaso wadde ku mutwe, naye ebyafaayo by'obujjanjabi byewuunyisa olw'obulumi bw'omutwe obw'amaanyi, obunene obungi, n'okulongoosebwa kw'omu lubuto.
3. Omulwadde tasobola kugumiikiriza kukwata ku ludda lwa ddyo mu maaso.

Levetiracetam (Keppra) kiyinza okukola bulungi mu kujjanjaba obulumi bw'okukuba amasasi ku matama, era kiyinza okukola bulungi mu kujjanjaba obulumi bw'omutwe obw'amaanyi, obunene obungi, n'okulongoosebwa kw'omu lubuto. Levetiracetam kiyinza okukola bulungi mu kujjanjaba obulumi buno kubanga kiyinza okukuuma amannyo, okukwata amannyo, n'okwoza amannyo.

Ddagala endala nga Carbamazepine, Lamotrigine, ne Topiramate biyinza okukola bulungi mu kujjanjaba obulumi bw'okukuba amasasi, naye tebiyinza kukola bulungi mu kujjanjaba obulumi bw'omutwe obw'amaanyi, obunene obungi, n'okulongoosebwa kw'omu lubuto.

Question:
Okunoonyereza ku kufuna olulimi olwokubiri kulaga ku bino wammanga ebikwata ku baana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri
A.Okusaasaawa kw'essaawa z'es
B.Balina ebigambo ebirungi okusinga abaana abatayogera nnimi bbiri
C.Obuwangwa bwabwe tebulina kye bukola ku mutindo gw'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri
D.Bayongedde obusobozi bw'okutegeera
GivenAnswer:
Ebigambo ebyo byonna biri mu nkola ey'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri eri abaana. Naye, okukakasa nti ebigambo ebyo byonna biri mu nkola, tukkiriza nti:

A. Okusaasaawa kw'essaawa z'essomero kwe kugobererwa nga kimu ku biseera ebikulu eri abaana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri. Okusaasaawa kw'essaawa z'essomero kuyamba abaana okukola emirimu gyabwe n'okukuuma obwegendereza.

B. Abaana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri balina ebigambo ebirungi okusinga abaana abatayogera nnimi bbiri. Okufuna ebigambo ebirungi kuyamba abaana okukola emirimu gyabwe n'okukuuma obwegendereza.

C. Obuwangwa bw'abaana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri bwe buba butali butuufu, kitegeeza nti tebulina kye bukola ku mutindo gw'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri. Obuwangwa obulungi bw'abaana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri bwe buba butuufu, kitegeeza nti bulina kye bukola ku mutindo gw'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri.

D. Abaana abafuna olulimi olwokubiri bayongedde obusobozi bw'okutegeera. Okuyongera obusobozi bw'okutegeera kuyamba abaana okukola emirimu gyabwe n'okukuuma obwegendereza.

Bwe tutunuulira ebigambo ebyo byonna, tukiraba nti biri mu nkola ey'okufuna olulimi olwokubiri eri abaana.
